NODE_RED_USERNAME.description: The username to secure the editor.

NODE_RED_PASSWORD.description: The password to secure the editor.

NODE_RED_CREDENTIAL_SECRET.description: A secure string used to encrypt credentials in storage.

NODE_RED_DISABLE_EDITOR.description: Set this to true to disable the editor (can be changed after deployment)

NODE_RED_EDITOR_URI.description: Path that the editor is served on (can be changed after deployment)

NODE_RED_DASHBOARD_URI.description: Path for the dashboard, Must not be the same as the editor (can be changed after deployment)
